Articles.Content:
This SSTO is my first Ion powered SSTO to be successful. Note that it isn't fully Ion-powered, and that the Ion engines should be used as a boost to get into orbit. It is 100% stock. From what I've heard, the rule is "no picks, no clicks", so here is a picture:

![AFF470CBCB5F8D59E7215C1B91361081024FFF19](http://cloud-4.steamusercontent.com/ugc/37492123357643688/AFF470CBCB5F8D59E7215C1B91361081024FFF19/)

Hotkeys/Action Groups: 1-Turns on/off single TurboJet Engine

 2-Turns on/off both Ion Engines

 3-Toggles RAM Air Intakes

 4-Extends solar panels (don't press until at least around 40 Kilometers).

 5-Extends Ladder

NOTE: It is unnecessary but beneficial to press 3 before the flight to reduce drag. Once the air intake amount reaches about 0.10, press 3 to increase intake air amount.

Also, this is one of my first attempts at an SSTO since I have focused mainly on rockets.

Download Here: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/c9u73r9nbq1ppvu/Ion%20SSTO.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/c9u73r9nbq1ppvu/Ion%20SSTO.craft?dl=0)
